author: Richard Fucillo
title: Carbon Sports Introduces AirBlade Ice Hockey Stick
text:
Carbon Sports has launched the AirBlade ice hockey stick, which is designed to provide superior durability and unmatched aerodynamics for increased shot speed and unparalleled puck feel. The blade of the AirBlade is made from 100% carbon fiber material with no foam core, which greatly enhances the blade’s durability. “The AirBlade’s patented technology reduces delamination of the blade and drastically extends the life of the stick,” said Richard Fucillo, COO of Carbon Sports. He further stated, “Carbon Sports’ carbon fiber material has passed 1,000,000 cycle tests, meaning that the AirBlade will never lose its ‘pop’ like other composite sticks on the market today.”
When it comes to puck feel, users describe the AirBlade as “an extension of your hands.” The solid carbon fiber blade and patented micro-grip technology provide a large sweet spot and better connect a player’s hands to the puck, providing incredible puck feel and increased shot accuracy. Due to the AirBlade’s perforated construction, air flows freely through the blade, reducing drag, increasing swing speed, and maximizing shot power.
“If you’re looking for the best hockey stick for the money, the AirBlade is the ideal choice,” stated Mr. Fucillo.
The AirBlade can be tailored to player specifications by choosing curve, flex, grip and orientation. All sticks come with an industry-leading 30-day money-back guarantee and a 60-day general warranty. The AirBlade can be purchased exclusively at http://www.carbonsportshockey.com/ .
